misuse: CWE-330: Use of Insufficiently Random Values
description: In the given code, the SecureRandom object is seeded with a single long value generated by the nextLong() method. This single value does not provide sufficient randomness for cryptographic purposes.
recommendation: To ensure sufficient randomness, it is recommended to use a stronger seed generation mechanism, such as using multiple random values or a combination of system time and other sources of randomness.
